subject: C unit testing framework?
msgSnippet: All, Sorry for a slight off-topic query.  I need to help a team familiar with JUnit that just adopted a project written in C (not C++).  Any suggestions which
messageBody:
All,

Sorry for a slight off-topic query. I need to help a team familiar
with JUnit that just adopted a project written in C (not C++). Any
suggestions which of the options at
http://opensourcetesting.org/unit_c.php would be optimal for this
team? Many thanks,

David Saff
